content: @Mark Scrimshire Is the assumption that PDEX supports the same search profile search functionality as USCore? And is there a link for the capability statement similar to USCore: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CapabilityStatement-us-core-server.html
Yes we assume US Core search capabilities. We will look at providing more than just the example CapabilityStatement.

Hello,

Here is the diagram I would like to share at the connectathon.

Member-Facilitated-B2B-Exchange-Alternative.PNG

Thanks again @Mark Scrimshire!
@Josh Lamb How about a Q&A Session on the PDex track and you can bring up your Questions and ideas

Hi, @Mark Scrimshire, do you mean for tomorrow? I do not see any more stream open for PDex today. Am I missing one of them?

Thanks.
I don't have anything specific scheduled today after the formulary IG and RI review. We could do something at 2pm PT
Thanks. I look forward to speaking with the group then.
How would you summarize what you want to discuss?
Bi-Directional Consumer access and data exchange? Something like that??

Yes, that will work. Or you could call it a consumer-mediated business-to-business exchange. The goal is to improve patient access while meeting business-to-business use cases (and keeping HIPAA protections) while reducing costs and reducing data segmentation (multiple APIs).
I have you down for 5pm ET but it is at same time as CAQH session
@Josh Lamb There are a couple of us on the PDex Track are we going to do your session?
@Mark Scrimshire session will be 7PM ET. I did not want to conflict with the CAQH session.
